name: tmda_filter.vim
description:
Colorizes the filter files used by TMDA ( http://www.tmda.net/ ), the Tagged Message Delivery Agent.

I don't use all of the features of TMDA, so please let me know of any things that should be colorized and aren't.
install_details:
copy into your ~/.vim/syntax directory.  I also created a .vim/filetype.vim with the following contents:

au BufRead,BufNewFile */.tmda/filters/* setfiletype tmda_filter
